items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing!! Perfect for family photos!
items.body: I purchased this dress in the brown color for fall family photos on the beach. I bought the XS and typically wear XS or S. It fit great and the bottom was so flowy and beautiful. The color is a deep rich brown and there is an inner liner so itâ€™s not see through at all even with the sun shining behind me in photos. I actually decided to cut the stitching that connected the sleeves to the rest of the dress so it was a sleeveless and strapless dress for photos and this was relatively easy to do without cutting the rest of the dress. If I was doing photos at home in Indiana I would have definitely kept the sleeves but wanted something more beachy! This dress is very versatile, I can wear it with a sweater on top for fall and winter and itâ€™ll look like a maxi skirt. Overall I am so pleased with this purchase and will be ordering other colors for sure! Read more
items.author: JENNA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering, Comfortable, and So Stylish!
items.body: I absolutely love this ZESICA boho off-shoulder dress! The fit is incredibly flattering thanks to the smocked high waist, and the off-shoulder design gives it a sexy but still classy look. The side split adds just the right amount of flair without being too much. The long sleeves balance the dress perfectly, making it great for both warmer and cooler weather. The fabric is soft, comfortable, and flows beautifully when you move. I felt confident and comfortable wearing it all day. This dress works great for so many occasionsâ€”date night, vacation, brunch, or even a casual event when dressed up with heels and accessories. It looks even better in person and fits true to size. Highly recommend if youâ€™re looking for a boho-chic dress thatâ€™s both stylish and comfortable! Read more
items.author: Shyenne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT FOR BEACH PICTURES!!!!!
items.body: This ZESICA maxi dress is absolutely gorgeous! The off-shoulder style is flattering, the smocked waist fits perfectly, and the flowy tiered skirt with the side slit adds just the right touch of boho elegance. The fabric is comfortable and moves beautifully, making it perfect for both casual outings and special occasions. I received so many complimentsâ€”love this dress! ðŸ’• Read more
items.author: Julia

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars It was slightly different color
items.body: Absolutely love this dress! The off-shoulder style is flattering and feminine, and the fabric feels light and flowy â€” perfect for summer or vacation photos. Although I had to return it because the shade of it didnâ€™t balance well with my family outfits- we peered planning a beach photo shoot. It fits true to size and has that effortless boho vibe thatâ€™s easy to dress up or down. I paired it with sandals for a casual look, but it would look gorgeous with heels for an evening out. Beautiful color, great quality, and such a good value for the price! Read more
items.author: Madeby_Julija

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy the dress!!!
items.body: LOVE this dress, perfect for my friendâ€™s beach wedding! I was the made of honor, and I got lots of compliments. Dress is flowy, comfy, flirty (long slit to show off some leg) and very flattering. Material is thin so nice for warmer climates but not see through. I think it would be beautiful in fall colors with tights, tall boots, jean jacket/vest and maybe a wool brimmed hat to make it suitable for colder weather. Very feminine dress that will turn heads! Read more

items.body: Color was as expected, thin but not see through. Used it for maternity photos but can wear it after as well! The length was perfect. Iâ€™m 5â€™6â€ so a lot of stuff is short but this fit great! I would wear this casually or formally. Seams were high quality. items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars I returned it BUT..
items.body: I bought it for my family photos and it was ok. The style is cute but it looks more like a maternity dress which is great if that is the style you are going for but I am postpartum so I felt like it made me feel bulky. I am a 5 foot girl and the size small was a perfect length. So I would recommend as I loved the color and it has potential! Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Off Shoulder Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Off Shoulder Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Off Shoulder Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Rust, Cherry, Fuchsia, Rose, Light Yellow, Coffee, Orange, Dark Green, Light Blue, Olive, Navy, Pink, White, Dark Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
